tool_description: Analyzes historical supplier performance to calculate average lead times, variability, and reliability metrics for procurement planning.

supplier_ids.description: List of supplier IDs to analyze

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs to analyze by supplier

analysis_start_date.description: Start date for historical analysis period

analysis_end_date.description: End date for historical analysis period

minimum_orders.description: Minimum number of orders required for reliable analysis (5-50)

error_messages: Insufficient order history: Less than minimum_orders found for supplier-product combination. Increase analysis period or reduce minimum_orders.
Invalid date range: analysis_start_date must be before analysis_end_date.
Supplier not found: One or more supplier IDs do not exist in the system.
No matching orders: No purchase orders found for the specified supplier-product combinations in the date range.
usage: Provide supplier and product IDs with a historical analysis period. The tool examines past orders to calculate lead time statistics and reliability metrics.

average_lead_times.description: Average lead time in days for each supplier-product combination

lead_time_variability.description: Standard deviation of lead times for each combination

on_time_delivery_rate.description: Percentage of orders delivered on or before promised date

reliability_score.description: Overall supplier reliability score (0-100) for each combination
